title: Fragments, 17th century
medium:
Medium" silk, linen
Technique; two integrated structures, plain weave plus plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivès y Escudero
description:
Flowering urn with birds within curving, fruiting vines with leopards in blue and gold. Narrow vertical border with diagonal plant motifs at right side.
Selvage on fragment A.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 17th century.
17th century. Medium" silk, linen
Technique; two integrated structures, plain weave plus plain weave. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-608-a,b.
